DESCRIPTION: What is the business issue to solve?
How much business value will the project generate?
What is the best metric to assess if the project is a success?
What is the performance level to achieve?
What is the deliverable?
How complex is the problem from the technical perspective?
Who is going to use the deliverable?
How will they use it?
What are the operational constraints of the business?
What is the actual and future costs of the project?
Who is sponsoring the project?
Who is funding the development of this project?
Who has the final say on the project?
Who is working operationally on the project?
What will be the role of each contributor in the project?
What are the rules to apply during this project?
Does the project comply with the company ethics?
Is the project compliant with the local and global regulations?
What is the project timeline, including key milestones?
Is there any existing documentation or previous work related to this project ?
How to access the data now and in the future?
What is the total size of the data?
Where is the data stored?
What is the format of the data?
What is the quality of the data?
Is there a description of the available datasets?
Does the project require data labelling?
What is the offline metric used to evaluate the model?
What is the expected model performance based on that metric?
Does the team know how to work together in agile mode?
Is there a collaborative development environment available to everyone?
Does the infrastructure has enough computing power, storage, and network bandwidth?
Do you have a clearly defined process to release the project in production?
Who is going to do the maintenance after the release?
Is there a monitoring system to measure and validate metrics after the release?
What is the communication strategy around this project?
